name: City Builder Prototype Demo
description:
This is a prototype demo of a new space style city builder game I am designing. The plans are to turn this into a full game based on colonizing and abandoned planet. The current build of the game includes only the building and deleting mechanic. Of course more will come in the future. 

Controls:

- Click and Drag with mouse  :  Build

- R : Rotate

If you do play the demo, it would be extremely helpful if you could leave feedback below:

Feedback Form Link
